Welcome to the UB Ethical AI Working Group

The UB Ethical AI working group studies how artificial intelligence (AI) tools are used to make decisions that affect the rights and opportunities of citizens.

Click here to get added to the UB Ethical AI mailing list and receive updates about events, talks, etc.

We are grateful for funding from the Germination Space program at University at Buffalo.
